attributes.action: Make school days 4 days long with an extra hour but it is 1 hour with friends
attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen because I think that it will improve the kids mental health and make people like school more and there might be a smaller suicide rate for kids and teenagers
attributes.background: So basically I want the Government or Parliament to let kids have 4 days of school each week with an extra hour but the extra hour will be a time where you can hang out with your friends and do fun activities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Reduce the school week to four days a week 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727514

You mention children's mental health in your petition. Children and young people struggling with their mental health can find information about support here: https://www.youngminds.org.uk/
